name: Zombie Soccer Stars! Lite - Fun Soccer Simulator
name_original: Zombie Soccer Stars! Lite - Fun Soccer Simulator
description:
A super fun soccer game with easy controls. What are you waiting for? Play soccer with zombies! Split defences with precise through balls, or bend shots into the top corner, putting you in control for an unrivalled mobile soccer experience. Gameplay lets you control the action. Play this fun soccer game anytime, anywhere. Don’t miss out on this chance to have tons of fun!


KEY FEATURES:
- Simple and fun gameplay
- Amazing ball physics
- Play against zombies
- Real soccer physics simulator
